mapper.select: SELECT tb_group.*,count(post.id) as postCount FROM tb_group inner join user_group on user_group.group_id = tb_group.id LEFT JOIN post on tb_group.id = post.group_id where user_group.user_id = #{userId} group by tb_group.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_group (user_id, group_id, create_time) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{groupId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
